replies.bodyText:
oh, sorry, I misunderstood your question :)
It seems I missed it and Quarkus does not have this validation. I created an issue for it, will fix it tomorrow: quarkusio/quarkus#8567
For Quarkus we don't have info on the present annotations here, it's taken from Jandex so has to be done before calling defineWorker
replies.author: michalszynkiewicz

replies.bodyText:
@kenfinnigan I checked Quarkus once again and there @Blocking on methods that don't have @Incoming or @Outgoing will be ignored. That's because the logic for blocking is applied only to methods from MediatorBuildItems.
Anyway, such validation makes sense and I will add it to Quarkus.
replies.author: michalszynkiewicz
